name: Show JSON Bot
description: A simple bot to show JSON raw data of telegram messages.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get it from https://telegram.me/botfather

DOMAIN.description: MUST Set this value to <yourappname>.herokuapp.com or custom domain you are using this app. Or the bot won't work properly.

DB_ENABLE.description: Set to true if you want to logging users to Firebase and Update users in channel.

DB_URL.description: Firebase Real-Time Database URL. Set only if DB_ENABLE is true. See docs to know how to get values: github.com/dcdunkan/show-json-bot

PRIVATE_KEY.description: A long Private Key string of Firebase Project. Set only if DB_ENABLE is true. See docs to know how to get values: github.com/dcdunkan/show-json-bot

CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Client Email ID of Firebase Project. Set only if DB_ENABLE is true. See docs to know how to get values: github.com/dcdunkan/show-json-bot

CHANNEL_LOG.description: Set to true if you want start/error log to private/public channel.

CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the channel you want to log messages. And the bot must be admin with edit message permission. Only set if CHANNEL_LOG is true.

USERS_MSG_ID.description: ID of a message in the Channel to update number of users. Only set if both DB_ENABLE and CHANNEL_LOG is true.

SHOWED_JSON_MSG_ID.description: ID of the message which has number of total printed JSONs.  Only set if both DB_ENABLE and CHANNEL_LOG is true.
